Welcome the Expected.Request's documentation!

Expected.Request, a simple API testing framework.

View the Project on GitHub

  • Home
  • Request
  • ExpectRequest
  • DoneRequest

    • Method

    Task<IRequest> Request();

    Calling Request allows you to move into your next request within the chain and perform a Get, Put, Post, or Delete. There are extensions that allow you to skip the Request call and move straight into the request verb, and they can be found here

    Example

    await new Request()
    .Get("http://localhost:8080/api/todo")
    .Next(x => x.Request())
    .Next(x => x.Delete("http://localhost:8080/api/todo/1"))
    .Done();

    Back to ExpectRequest
